Question: LG NOVA Zenith Electronics LLC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
LG Electronics

CES 2024 Product Highlights

- LG SIGNATURE OLED T Hero
  - World’s first 4K wireless transparent TV
  - Upgraded refresh rate to 144Hz
  - 150% brighter in peak highlights

- webOS
  - Infinite entertainment options

- LG NOVA
  - Collaboration with startups for future business creation

- Awards and Recognitions
  - Over 200 awards at CES 2024
  - 33 CES Innovation Awards, including 15 for LG TVs
  - 12 consecutive years of CES Innovation Award honors for LG OLED TVs
Summary_cn:
LG电子

CES 2024产品亮点

- LG SIGNATURE OLED T英雄
  - 世界上第一台4K无线透明电视
  - 刷新频率升级至144Hz
  - 高亮度区域提升了150%

- webOS
  - 无限娱乐选择

- LG NOVA
  - 与初创企业合作，为未来创造业务机会

- 获奖与认可
  - 在CES 2024获得200多个奖项
  - 33个CES创新奖，其中包括15个LG电视奖项
  - LG OLED电视连续12年获得CES创新奖奖项
